Share Center actions and hooks: Centro de partilha de acções e ganchos(hooks)
Hidden file containing shared metadata: Ficheiro oculto que contém informação de Metadata partilhada
Where to store the metadata file : LOCAL: Onde guardar o ficheiro de Metadata : LOCAL significa que será criado um ficheiro oculto em cada pasta, GLOBAL significa que será criado um ficheiro na pasta 'DATA_PATH/plugins/action.share'.
Use web server RewriteEngine mechanism t: Use web server RewriteEngine mechanism to generate prettier URLs
Minimum length of the generated hash: Minimum length of the generated hash
Maximum share expiration limit for file,: Maximum share expiration limit for file, 0 = unlimited
Maximum download limit for file, 0 = unl: Maximum download limit for file, 0 = unlimited
Create and display QRCode for shared lin: Create and display QRCode for shared link
Disallow users to create shared folders: Disallow users to create shared folders if a workspace already exists with the same label
Minimum number of characters to start ge: Minimum number of characters to start getting results by auto-completion when sharing a folder with other users
Limit the number of results returned by: Limit the number of results returned by the auto-completion feature when sharing a folder with other users
Mandatory prefix for users created tempo: Mandatory prefix for users created temporary users login
Image used as a button for downloading t: Image used as a button for downloading the file
Top-right logo displayed on minisite pag: Top-right logo displayed on minisite page
Do not allow users to create public link: Do not allow users to create public links, only private links (password-protected)
If you detect performances issues while: If you detect performances issues while modifiyng files under deep trees, try activating that one. Please be sure of what you do, this may trigger a whole lot of php processes on the server.
Enable public link generation for files: Enable public link generation for files
Allow users to manually choose a hash fo: Allow users to manually choose a hash for the generated links
Allow users to generate public links on: Allow users to generate public links on files
Enable internal file sharing (sharing wi: Enable internal file sharing (sharing with users existing or temporary users)
Allow users to generate public links on: Allow users to generate public links on folders
Enable internal folder sharing (sharing: Enable internal folder sharing (sharing with users existing or temporary users)
